channel.title: Home Internet on LoopedNetwork
channel.description: Recent content in Home Internet on LoopedNetwork

item.title: Trying T-Mobile Home Internet
item.description: For the majority of my life, I’ve only had one Internet service provider where I lived. That was originally just a single dial-up provider when I was growing up to only having one coaxial cable provider at 4 different apartments in the span of 11 years. That recently changed when I went from having a single provider (coax) where I’m currently at to having 3 providers (coax, 5G, and fiber.)
